snippet.title: Xatax (Dos game 1994)
snippet.description:
Xatax is a horizontal side-scrolling shoot 'em up game by Pixel Painters Corporation.

You can use a basic weapon and a special powerful bomb.
The weapon of the main player is so weak.
Although the weapon is upgraded, the basic enemy units don't die easily.
Especially, it's so hard to remove immobile, fixed enemy units which attached to the walls.
